trans-unit.source: Sets the start cap for a Pen object

seg-source.mrk: Sets the start cap for a Pen object

target.mrk: Sets the start cap for a Pen object

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a Pen object

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a Pen object

target.mrk: Pointer to a Pen object

trans-unit.source: Line cap style:

seg-source.mrk: Line cap style:

target.mrk: Line cap style:

trans-unit.source: 0x00 - Line ends at the last point. The end is squared off

seg-source.mrk: 0x00 - Line ends at the last point.
The end is squared off

target.mrk: 0x00 - Line ends at the last point.
The end is squared off

trans-unit.source: 0x01 - Square cap. The center of the square is the last point in the line. The height and width of the square are the line width.

seg-source.mrk: 0x01 - Square cap.
The center of the square is the last point in the line.
The height and width of the square are the line width.

target.mrk: 0x01 - Square cap.
The center of the square is the last point in the line.
The height and width of the square are the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x02 - Circular cap. The center of the circle is the last point in the line. The diameter of the circle is the line width.

seg-source.mrk: 0x02 - Circular cap.
The center of the circle is the last point in the line.
The diameter of the circle is the line width.

target.mrk: 0x02 - Circular cap.
The center of the circle is the last point in the line.
The diameter of the circle is the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x03 - Triangular cap. The base of the triangle is the last point in the line. The base of the triangle is the line width.

seg-source.mrk: 0x03 - Triangular cap.
The base of the triangle is the last point in the line.
The base of the triangle is the line width.

target.mrk: 0x03 - Triangular cap.
The base of the triangle is the last point in the line.
The base of the triangle is the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x10 - Line ends are not anchored.

seg-source.mrk: 0x10 - Line ends are not anchored.

target.mrk: 0x10 - Line ends are not anchored.

trans-unit.source: 0x11 - Line ends are anchored with a square. The center of the square is the last point in the line. The height and width of the square are the line width.

seg-source.mrk: 0x11 - Line ends are anchored with a square.
The center of the square is the last point in the line.
The height and width of the square are the line width.

target.mrk: 0x11 - Line ends are anchored with a square.
The center of the square is the last point in the line.
The height and width of the square are the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x12 - Line ends are anchored with a circle. The center of the circle is at the last point in the line. The circle is wider than the line.

seg-source.mrk: 0x12 - Line ends are anchored with a circle.
The center of the circle is at the last point in the line.
The circle is wider than the line.

target.mrk: 0x12 - Line ends are anchored with a circle.
The center of the circle is at the last point in the line.
The circle is wider than the line.

trans-unit.source: 0x13 - Line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees). The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line. The diamond is wider than the line.

seg-source.mrk: 0x13 - Line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees).
The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line.
The diamond is wider than the line.

target.mrk: 0x13 - Line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees).
The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line.
The diamond is wider than the line.

trans-unit.source: 0x14 - Line ends are anchored with arrowheads. The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line. The arrowhead is wider than the line.

seg-source.mrk: 0x14 - Line ends are anchored with arrowheads.
The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line.
The arrowhead is wider than the line.

target.mrk: 0x14 - Line ends are anchored with arrowheads.
The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line.
The arrowhead is wider than the line.

trans-unit.source: 0xff - Line ends are made from a CustomLineCap object.

seg-source.mrk: 0xff - Line ends are made from a CustomLineCap object.

target.mrk: 0xff - Line ends are made from a CustomLineCap object.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: True.

seg-source.mrk: True.

target.mrk: True.

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).
